entities.name: mr borgin
entities.description: Mr Borgin is a person who works in the shop, described as muttering darkly.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is waiting for Mr Borgin to come back and then slips out of the cabinet.

relationships.description: Mr Borgin interacted with Harry by disappearing into a back room, making Harry wait for a minute before slipping out of the cabinet.
